org.fraunhofer.java_mqtt_usability_client.manager

Class MqttSenderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fraunhofer.java_mqtt_usability_client.manager.MqttSenderManager

  • public class MqttSenderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Matthias The SenderManager, which can store multiple clients that can be used for sending messages to a specified topic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MqttSenderManager()
      the manager responsible for sending messages and Homey commands

    • Method Summary

      this function is used to send a message to a given topic

      this function is used to send a message to a given topic with the given username and password as authentification

    • Method Detail

      • sendCommand

        public java.lang.String sendCommand(java.lang.String topic,
                                    java.lang.String command,
                                    java.lang.String clientName,
                                    java.lang.String deviceName,
                                    java.lang.String capability,
                                    java.lang.String value)
        Parameters:
        topic - the target topic for the command.
        command - the command that will be given (for example set).
        clientName - the name of the client that should be used to send the command
        deviceName - the name of the device that will receive the command. It has to be a unique name.
        capability - the capability of the device for which the command is intended
        value - the value that the capability should assume after receiving the command
        Returns:
        returns the success or failure of the message transmission

      • sendMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMessage(java.lang.String topic,
                                    java.lang.String clientName,
                                    java.lang.String content)
        this function is used to send a message to a given topic
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to which this message should be send
        clientName - the name of the client that should be used to send the message
        content - the content of the message
        Returns:
        returns the success or failure of the message transmission

      • sendMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMessage(java.lang.String topic,
                                    java.lang.String clientName,
                                    java.lang.String content,
                                    java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        this function is used to send a message to a given topic with the given username and password as authentification
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to which this message should be send
        clientName - the name of the client that should be used to send the message
        content - the content of the message
        username - the username that should be used for authentification
        password - the password that should be used for authentification
        Returns:
        returns the success or failure of the message transmission

      • addMqttClient

        public void addMqttClient(java.lang.String broker,
                          java.lang.String clientName)
        add a client to the manager that can be used to send messages or commands
        Parameters:
        broker - the broker over which messages should be sent
        clientName - the name for the client with which to access it for the sake of sending messages or commands
